category.name: iSphere Job Log Explorer for RDi 8.0+
iSphere Additions for RDi 8.0+ (optional, see description)

category-def.name: iSphere for RDi 8.0+ (Base Component)
category-def.label: iSphere for RDi 8.0+ (Base Component)
category-def.description: iSphere for RDi 8.0+. Base component of the iSphere plug-in. This component is required for all RDi versions.

category-def.name: iSphere Additions for RDi 9.5+ (recommended)
category-def.label: iSphere Additions for RDi 9.5+ (recommended)
category-def.description: Optional additions for RDi 9.5+. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for RDi 8.0+".

category-def.name: iSphere TN5250J for RDi 8.0+
category-def.label: iSphere TN5250J for RDi 8.0+
category-def.description: iSphere TN5250J emulator for RDi 8.0+. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for RDi 8.0+".

category-def.name: iSphere STRPREPRC Utility for RDi 8.0+
category-def.label: iSphere STRPREPRC Utility for RDi 8.0+
category-def.description: Plug-in that extends the context menu of the Lpex editor with options to add/remove a STRPREPRC header. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for RDi 8.0+".

category-def.name: iSphere Job Log Explorer for RDi 8.0+
category-def.label: iSphere Job Log Explorer for RDi 8.0+
category-def.description: Plug-in that adds an editor for exploring job log spooled files. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for RDi 8.0+".

category-def.name: iSphere Journal Explorer for RDi 8.0+
category-def.label: iSphere Journal Explorer for RDi 8.0+
category-def.description: Plug-in that adds views for exploring output files of the DSPJRN command. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for RDi 8.0+".

category-def.name: iSphere Additions for RDi 8.0+ (optional, see description)
category-def.label: iSphere Additions for RDi 8.0+ (optional, see description)
category-def.description: Optional LPEX editor additions for RDi 8.0+. Requires installing the iSphere base component "iSphere for RDi 8.0+". This component contains features that actually have been developed for WDSCi. Users who use WDSCi and RDi may install this component to use the same functions and keyboard shortcuts as with WDSCi.
